overview: A brief overview of the "cycle" of oppression and exploitation: on the one hand women, queers, the elderly, refugees and the physically and mentally handicapped, and on the other the hierarchy of power and domination with all its means: government, religion, media and elections. An image of a contemporary human being marginalized under the late capitalism domination is eliminated and oppressed.
tagline: A film made by minorities for the minorities
title: The Cycle
